channel.title: Cerulean Realms: Campaign 1
channel.itunes:subtitle: DnD 5e Podcast for a home game to share with family and friends.
channel.itunes:summary: A DnD podcast for a home game following an odd bunch of adventurers in a homebrew world.
channel.description: A DnD podcast for a home game following an odd bunch of adventurers in a homebrew world.
channel.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: A Spider's Burrough
item.itunes:title: A Spider's Burrough
item.description: The Guardians of Dwaine fight a ginormous spider and spend their first night in the Neverwinter Wood.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Guardians of Dwaine fight a ginormous spider and spend their first night in the Neverwinter Wood.
item.itunes:summary: The Guardians of Dwaine fight a ginormous spider and spend their first night in the Neverwinter Wood.
item.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: Interrogating a Wizard
item.itunes:title: Interrogating a Wizard
item.description: Efforts are made to interrogate an evil wizard, and the Guardians of Dwaine meet another traveler and head north in search of another ally.
item.itunes:subtitle: Efforts are made to interrogate an evil wizard, and the Guardians of Dwaine meet another traveler and head north in search of another ally.
item.itunes:summary: Efforts are made to interrogate an evil wizard, and the Guardians of Dwaine meet another traveler and head north in search of another ally.
item.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: Prisoners of Glasstaff
item.itunes:title: Prisoners of Glasstaff
item.description: Returning to the adventure, the party gathers their wits and continue exploring the basement of Trescendar Manor.
item.itunes:subtitle: Returning to the adventure, the party gathers their wits and continue exploring the basement of Trescendar Manor.
item.itunes:summary: Returning to the adventure, the party gathers their wits and continue exploring the basement of Trescendar Manor.
item.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: The Redbrand Distraction
item.itunes:title: The Redbrand Distraction
item.description: The Guardians of Dwaine get distracted by events in Phandalin and are otherwise prevented from leaving the town while they take care of some local business.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Guardians of Dwaine get distracted by events in Phandalin and are otherwise prevented from leaving the town while they take care of some local business.
item.itunes:summary: The Guardians of Dwaine get distracted by events in Phandalin and are otherwise prevented from leaving the town while they take care of some local business.
item.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: Guardians of Dwaine
item.itunes:title: Guardians of Dwaine
item.description: Dekom, Dorian, Lo'Liko, and Minow take some downtime to collect themselves in Phandalin, where they meet Piddic and some residents of the town.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dekom, Dorian, Lo'Liko, and Minow take some downtime to collect themselves in Phandalin, where they meet Piddic and some residents of the town.
item.itunes:summary: Dekom, Dorian, Lo'Liko, and Minow take some downtime to collect themselves in Phandalin, where they meet Piddic and some residents of the town.
item.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: Mystery and Spooks
item.itunes:title: Mystery and Spooks
item.description: The party gets sucked into exploring a haunted manor on the outskirts of Phandalin, and hijinks ensure.
item.itunes:subtitle: The party gets sucked into exploring a haunted manor on the outskirts of Phandalin, and hijinks ensure.
item.itunes:summary: The party gets sucked into exploring a haunted manor on the outskirts of Phandalin, and hijinks ensure.
item.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: The Cave Part 2: New "Friends"
item.itunes:title: The Cave Part 2: New "Friends"
item.description: After defeating the leader in the goblin hideout, the unlikely group kills the remaining goblins and saves a new "friend".
item.itunes:subtitle: After defeating the leader in the goblin hideout, the unlikely group kills the remaining goblins and saves a new "friend".
item.itunes:summary: After defeating the leader in the goblin hideout, the unlikely group kills the remaining goblins and saves a new "friend".
item.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: The Cave in the Hill
item.itunes:title: The Cave in the Hill
item.description: The squad takes on the goblins of the Cragmaw tribe.
item.itunes:subtitle: The squad takes on the goblins of the Cragmaw tribe.
item.itunes:summary: The squad takes on the goblins of the Cragmaw tribe.
item.itunes:author: Dustin Yost

item.title: A Trek To Phandalin
item.itunes:title: A Trek To Phandalin
item.description: Dekom, Dorian, Lo'Liko, and Minow begin their journey towards Phandalin.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dekom, Dorian, Lo'Liko, and Minow begin their journey towards Phandalin.
item.itunes:summary: Dekom, Dorian, Lo'Liko, and Minow begin their journey towards Phandalin.

item.title: Sewer Spelunking
item.itunes:title: Sewer Spelunking

item.title: Finding Footing in Neverwinter
item.itunes:title: Finding Footing in Neverwinter
item.description: A new party finds themselves in the hold of a pirate ship.
